attributes.action: Christians and Muslims Against Gay and Lesbian Marriage Legislation Proposals
attributes.additional_details:
As God-fearing and Bible-believing Christians, and Muslim adherents and followers of the Koran, we cannot stand by an allow the Religious Institution of Marriage to be desecrated and devalued by the proposed Government Legislation to redefine "Marriage" as no long being between just one man and one woman.
-
To the Government: Do not attempt to redefine Marriage beyond the union of one man and one woman, as this goes against the fundamental morality our Country was built upon.
